summary: This document contains corporate resolutions from JEGE Inc. authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts on behalf of the corporation. It lists authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke, who are empowered to act on behalf of the corporation regarding these accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for JEGE Inc., allowing him to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is also listed as an authorized signer for JEGE Inc., with similar powers regarding the management of accounts.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for JEGE Inc., indicating a professional relationship in managing corporate accounts.

keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions for JEGE Inc. authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are named as authorized signers for the corporation.
The resolutions allow the authorized signers to manage, open, and close accounts with the bank.
The document emphasizes that the bank can rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
There are indications of powers being delegated to agents by the authorized signers.
